roleset.name: deal with

example.name: transitive
example.text: The sad reality is that the retail investor continues to pursue stellar performers first, while leaving institutions to grapple with basis points of performance on large sums of money quarter by quarter.
example.arg: with basis points of performance on large sums of money

roleset.note: GRAPPLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'grapple' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with 'cope' on the basis of syntax, not meaning. (from grapple.01-v predicate notes)
